meanings.definition: Not excluding or limited to a particular group or individual.
meanings.sent1: The nonexclusives event welcomed everyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a wide selection of nonexclusives items for sale.
meanings.sent3: The nonexclusives party had guests from all walks of life.
meanings.sent4: Her nonexclusives attitude made her popular among her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The nonexclusives policy ensured equal opportunities for all employees.

meanings.definition: Items or products that are not restricted to a single entity or group.
meanings.sent1: The online marketplace had a section dedicated to nonexclusives.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in selling nonexclusives to various retailers.
meanings.sent3: The nonexclusives on the menu were a hit with the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe consisted mostly of nonexclusives from different brands.
meanings.sent5: The store promoted the benefits of nonexclusives to attract more customers.
